author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Biolase Has Asked Jonathan Lord Chairman Of Board Of Biolase, To Lead Co's Exploration Of Strategic Alternatives
text:
April 11 (Reuters) - BIOLASE Inc:
* HAS ASKED JONATHAN T. LORD CHAIRMAN OF BOARD OF BIOLASE, TO LEAD COâ€™S EXPLORATION OF STRATEGIC ALTERNATIVES
* BOARD HAS ALSO APPOINTED CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER JOHN BEAVER AS INTERIM CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER
* BEAVER REPLACES HAROLD FLYNN, JR., WHO HAS RESIGNED FROM HIS POSITIONS AS PRESIDENT AND CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER
* STRATEGIC ALTERNATIVES MAY INCLUDE A MERGER OR OTHER BUSINESS COMBINATION WITH ANOTHER PARTY Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
